sense.def:
Purely
pomeni tudi tak, da zadeva samo eno lastnost ali značilnost, drugih pa ne.

seg.quote: ...something purely practical like mending a washing machine.
There's nothing personal in this. Purely a routine check.

sense.def:
Z izrazom
purely and simply
poudarimo, da gre izključno za eno stvar.

seg.quote: It is done through ignorance purely and simply.
